name: com.unity.meshsync
description: Working together with MeshSyncDCCPlugin, MeshSync provides features to reflect changes to models made in DCC tools into Unity in real time

upm.changelog:
### Added
* feat: Instance rendering 
* doc: Geometry Nodes documentation

### Changed
* change: make some classes/functions/members to internal 

### Fixed
* plugin-fix: support Mac OSX starting from 10.12
